name: id
description: The ID of the card.

name: heading
description: Text to use within the heading of the card component. If `headingHtml` is provided, the `heading` argument will be ignored.

name: headingHtml
description: HTML to use within the heading of the card component. If `headingHtml` is provided, the `heading` argument will be ignored.

name: headingClasses
description: Classes to add to the card heading.

name: headingSize
description: Size of the heading – `"xss"`, `"xs"`, `"s"`, `"m"`, `"l"` or `"xl"`.

name: headingLevel
description: Optional heading level for the card heading. Defaults to `2`.

name: headingVisuallyHiddenText
description: Optional visually hidden prefix used before the heading.

name: href
description: The value of the card link `href` attribute.

name: clickable
description: If set to `true`, then the whole card will become a clickable card variant.

name: type
description: Care card variant type – `"non-urgent"`, `"urgent"` or `"emergency"`.

name: feature
description: If set to `true`, then the card will become a feature card variant.

name: primary
description: If set to `true`, the card will become a primary card variant (with chevron).

name: secondary
description: If set to `true`, the card will become a secondary card variant.

name: warning
description: If set to `true`, then the card will become a warning card variant used by the warning callout.

name: imgURL
description: The URL of the image in the card.

name: imgALT
description: The alternative text of the image in the card.

name: description
description: Text description within the card content. If `descriptionHtml` is provided, the `description` argument will be ignored.

name: descriptionHtml
description: HTML to use within the card content. If `descriptionHtml` is provided, the `description` argument will be ignored.

name: actions
description: Can be used to add actions to the card component.

params.name: items
params.description: Array of actions as links for use in the card component.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute for an action item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: visuallyHiddenText
params.description: Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text. Text supplied to this option is appended to the end. Use `html` for more complicated scenarios.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the action item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the action item.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper.

name: caller
description: Not strictly a parameter but a Nunjucks code convention. Using a `call` block enables you to call a macro with all the text inside the tag. This is helpful if you want to pass a lot of content into a macro. To use it, you will need to wrap the entire card component in a `call` block.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the card.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the card.
